Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Los Fariones Hotel in Tias (Puerto del Carmen), you'll be minutes from Puerto del Carmen Beach and close to Lanzarote Golf Resort. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Rancho Texas Park and Pocillos Beach.

Rooms
Stay in one of 248 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature hair dryers and bathrobes.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and a hair salon.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Los Fariones Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Los Fariones Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Los Fariones Hotel in Tias (Puerto del Carmen), you'll be minutes from Puerto del Carmen Beach and close to Lanzarote Golf Resort. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Rancho Texas Park and Pocillos Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Puerto del Carmen Beach - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Lanzarote Golf Resort - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Rancho Texas Park - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Pocillos Beach - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Whale and Dolphin Museum - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Quemada Beach - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Deiland Shopping Center - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Centro Asociado de la UNED de Lanzarote - 12 km / 7.5 mi
Sports City of Lanzarote - 12 km / 7.5 mi
Timanfaya National Park - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Papagayo Beach - 14.6 km / 9.1 mi
Cesar Manrique Foundation - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi
Marina Rubicon - 16 km / 9.9 mi
Playa Dorada - 16.5 km / 10.2 mi
Los Hervideros Caves - 16.5 km / 10.3 mi

The preferred airport for Los Fariones Hotel is Arrecife (ACE-Lanzarote) - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
